entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: ESE 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
